attributes.action: charge more council tax to households with five or more adults.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many areas due to cultural and economic reasons two or three families live in one household. Each family uses local services such as rubbish collection, schools, library services, etc. Does each family in this household get a council tax bill? No, the two or three families pay as much in council tax as a neighbour with only one family in its household.
